mapper.insert:
select university_seq.nextval from dual
insert into university ( ID, USERID, UNAME, ENROLLDATE, GRADDATE, STATUS, DEGREE, MAJORTYPE,MAJORNAME,TOTALGRADE,MAJORGRADE,MAXGRADE, ISTRANSFER,FILEID1,FILEID2 ) values ( #{ID}, #{USERID}, #{UNAME}, #{ENROLLDATE}, #{GRADDATE}, #{STATUS}, #{DEGREE}, #{MAJORTYPE},#{MAJORNAME},#{TOTALGRADE},#{MAJORGRADE},#{MAXGRADE}, #{ISTRANSFER},"", "" ) where userId = #{userID} and id = #{ID}
mapper.update: update university set UNAME = #{name}, ENROLLDATE = #{enrollDate}, GRADDATE = #{gradDate}, STATUS = #{status}, DEGREE = #{degree}, MAJORTYPE = #{majorType}, MAJORNAME = #{majorName}, TOTALGRADE = #{totalGrade}, MAJORGRADE = #{majorGrade}, MAXGRADE = #{maxGrade}, ISTRANSFER = #{isTransfer}, FILEID1 = #{"test"}, FILEID2 = #{"test"} where userid = #{userId} and id = #{id}
